titles.title: O, That There Were Such A Heart In Them

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O, that there were such a heart in them,
That they would fear Me,
And keep all my commandments always,
That it might be well with them,
And with their children forever.
O, that there were such a heart in them.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ye shall walk in all the ways
Which the Lord your God hath commanded you,
That ye may live and that it may be well with you,
And that ye may prolong your days
In the land which ye shall possess.
O, that there were such a heart in them.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh quién tuviese tal corazón que me temiese
Y guardase mis mandamientos siempre
Para que a él y a sus hijos les fuese bien
Oh quién tuviese tal corazón.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Andad en el camino que el Señor os ha mandado
Para que viváis y os vaya bien
Para que viváis largos días en la tierra
La cual has de poseer
Oh quién tuviese tal corazón
